items.content:
• age of 100: Attained Nirväna. (Ref: D.2.2.6, p158)
  • 84th day: Attained omniscience after his renunciation. (Ref: E.2, p222)

• 72 years: The lifespan of Bhagawän Mahävir. (Ref: B.2.2.1, p18)
  • 30 years: Bhagawän Mahävir spent as a Tirthankar after attaining omniscience. (Ref: E.1.3.8.2, p219)
  • about 200 years: Time passed between Mahävir's Nirväna and the reign of Dhanänand. (Ref: F.4, p238)
  • 250 years: Time between the Nirväna of Tirthankar Pärshvanäth and the Nirväna of Tirthankar Mahävir. (Ref: D.2.2.6, p158)

• age of 100: Ganadhar Sudharmä-swämi attained Nirväna. (Ref: F.2, p234)
  • age of 92: Ganadhar Gautam-swämi attained Nirväna. (Ref: F.1.4, p233)
  • age of 80: Jambuswämi attained Nirväna. (Ref: F.3, p237)
  • twelve years: Duration of a great famine during Ächärya Bhadrabähu's time. (Ref: F.4, p240)
  • age of eighty-four: Ächärya Hemchandra died. (Ref: F.7, p248)

questions.question: When was Tirthankar Pärshvanäth born?
At what age did Tirthankar Pärshvanäth attain Nirväna?
What is the lifespan of Bhagawän Mahävir?
When was Ganadhar Gautam-swämi born?
When did Bhagawän Mahävir attain Nirväna?
questions.answer: 527 BC, at the age of seventy-two.

questions.question: Who wrote the Kalpa Sutra in the 3rd Century BC?
When did the great Jain king, Samprati, live?
questions.answer: 2nd half of 3rd Century BC & 1st half of 2nd Century B.C.

questions.question: When was Ächärya Kundkund approximately born?
questions.answer: Beginning of the first century A.D.

questions.question: In what year was the Kalpa Sutra written down for the first time on palm-leaf?
When was Ächärya Hemchandra born?
On which day after renunciation did Pärshvanäth attain omniscience?
For how many years did Bhagawän Mahävir live as a Tirthankar after omniscience?
What is the time difference between Pärshvanäth's Nirväna and Mahävir's Nirväna?
At what age did Ganadhar Sudharmä-swämi attain Nirväna?
What was the duration of the great famine during Ächärya Bhadrabähu's time?
In which century did Hermits start living at Shravanbelgola?
When was the Vimal Vasahi temple at Mount Äbu built?
When did Ächärya Hemchandra die?
questions.answer: 1173 A.D., at the age of eighty-four.

questions.question: Who built the Lunaga Vasahi temple at Mount Äbu?
When was the Ranakpur Jain temple built?
questions.answer: 15th century, during the reign of Ränä Kumbha.
